questions.question:
Select the verb in the active voice 
My music was considered uncool, but I always felt a connection with the audience. (Singer David Cassidy)
His command ________________
questions.explanation: We use the passive voice when we want to talk about an action, but are not interested in saying who/what does/did it.

questions.question: That portrait ________________ by my grandmother.
questions.explanation: Passive voice is used when the subject is not the doer of the action.

questions.question: They ________________ to the party.
questions.explanation: We use the passive voice, when the subject is not the doer of the action.

questions.question: Everybody ________________ with me.
questions.explanation: Active voice is used when the subject is the doer of the action.

questions.question: The ocean ________________ dry.
questions.explanation: The ocean does not perform any action here so a passive verb is required.

questions.question: I was very ________________ in the lesson.
